text: The 1988 Men's Hockey Champions Trophy was the tenth edition of the Hockey Champions Trophy men's field hockey tournament. It took place from Mar 25-Apr 1 in Lahore, Pakistan. ==Tournament== ===Final table=== ===Results=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !width=250| Team One !width=250| Team Two !width=80| Score |- ||| Great Britain||2-1 |- |||||0-1 |- |||||1-1 |- | Great Britain||||0-2 |- |||||3-1 |- |||||4-0 |- | Great Britain||||1-3 |- |||||1-2 |- |||||1-2 |- |||||1-1 |- |||||3-1 |- | Great Britain||||0-1 |- |||||0-0 |- | Great Britain||||1-3 |- |||||1-1 |- |} == References== C C 1988 Category:Champions Trophy (field hockey)
